name: Coffee Concentrate - Limited Release Flavors - Cold Brew Coffee, Perfect for Hot or Iced Instant Coffees, Hot Drinks, Cold Brew Concentrate, 35 Servings - Sugar Cookie
short_description: Premium Arabica Coffee – Our Coffee Concentrates are made with 100% natural arabica coffee that is ethically and sustainably sourced from farms all over the world. Each sip promises the experience of freshly brewed ice or hot coffee, without any bitterness or acidic aftertaste. Enjoy the taste of pure, ultra-smooth coffee in every sip!

Quality Ingredients – Indulge in a healthier coffee experience with our thoughtfully crafted coffee concentrates, a delicious alternative to conventional coffee shop beverages. Our concentrates are brewed using premium Arabica beans, purified water, and natural flavors—free from sugar, artificial additives, fillers, and preservatives.

Customizable Taste – With just a teaspoon, experience the power of 60mg of caffeine, mirroring the strength of a standard cup of coffee, while maintaining a consistent and delightful flavor profile. Select from our five delicious flavors and enjoy them in both iced and hot variations. With Javvy Coffee, the possibilities are endless. From cold brews to lattes, cappuccinos, cocktails, and more. Unleash your creativity and customize your coffee experience just the way you like it.

Insane Value – Each bottle contains up to 35 servings of coffee concentrate which is 3x more servings than our competitors. With Javvy Coffee, you're only spending less than $1/cup meaning you get to enjoy premium specialty coffee every day without breaking the bank!

Amazing Customer Service – We are confident you will enjoy our 100% natural coffee concentrate. If you encounter any concerns or have any inquiries, please reach out to us, and we promise to resolve any issue promptly and completely, ensuring your satisfaction every time.

name: JAVA HOUSE Cold Brew Coffee, Colombian 4:1 Liquid Concentrate, 32 Ounce Bottle
short_description: FLAVOR NOTES - Rich & Balanced Cold Brew - Premium 100% Arabica concentrate with bold flavor, smooth molasses and cocoa notes, and a hint of fruit—zero bitterness.
ENJOY HOT OR ICED - One Bottle, Endless Possibilities - Serve over ice, steam it hot, or blend it into recipes—your cold brew, your rules.
4:1 CONCENTRATE – Custom Strength, Instant Brew - Mix 1 part concentrate with 4 parts water (or milk!) for cold brew your way—bold or light, batch or single cup.
SLOW-STEEPED – Signature Small-Batch Cold Brew - Steeped in cold water for 12+ hours to unlock deep, full-bodied flavor with smooth, low-acid character.
VALUE-PACKED & FRIDGE-FRIENDLY - Cold Brew, Your Way - One compact 32oz bottle makes up to 10 cups—customize every pour, reseal for freshness, and save space in your fridge.
CAFFEINE – Contains 135 mg of caffeine per serving.

name: Dunkin’ Cold Brew Coffee Concentrate, 31 Oz.
short_description: Contains one (1) 31-oz. bottle of cold brew coffee concentrate
Just add water to enjoy delicious cold brew coffee at home
Bold and smooth, just the way you like it
Specially roasted for cold coffee that stands up to ice
Easy to make whenever the craving strikes
product_description: Craving something cold and bold? Enjoy delicious cold brew coffee at home whenever you want it. Just fill a glass with ice, then add equal parts water and Dunkin’ Cold Brew Concentrate. Or, for an even bolder taste, add more coffee concentrate. The result is smooth and pleasantly strong, not watery, because Dunkin’ Cold Brew Concentrate is specially roasted for cold coffee that stands up to ice. Drink it black, or customize it with your choice of sweetener and creamer. Suddenly, making your favorite cold brew coffee beverage is easier than ever. Order now to have it ready whenever the craving strikes.

name: Starbucks Cold Brew Coffee Concentrate, Dark Chocolate Hazelnut Flavored Iced Coffee, 32 fl oz
short_description: PREMIUM COLD BREW COFFEE: Enjoy the Starbucks cold brew coffee you love at home with this 32-fluid ounce bottle of Starbucks Cold Brew Concentrate Dark Chocolate Hazelnut
FLAVORED: Starbucks Cold Brew Concentrate Dark Chocolate Hazelnut is an easy-drinking custom blend of coffee with dark chocolate and hazelnut notes—making it perfectly delicious​

IT'S EASY: Starbucks cold-steeped a custom blend of coffee into this deliciously sweetened concentrate, so all you have to do is pour concentrate over ice and add water to craft your very own Starbucks iced coffee beverage
CRAFT IT YOUR WAY: Enjoy the same delicious Starbucks taste, no matter what you add to your glass—whether it’s coffee creamer, a dairy additive of your choice, coffee syrup or whipped cream
CAFÉ QUALITY: Starbucks adheres to the highest quality standards—shipping you the same artfully crafted Arabica coffee beans brewed in Starbucks cafés​
POUR, MIX, STIR & ENJOY: This Starbucks multi-serve cold brew concentrate bottle makes a total of 64 delicious fluid ounces of cold brewed coffee when prepared as directed so you can sip well
product_description: Your favorite cold brew is now easy to make at home with Starbucks Cold Brew Multi-Serve Concentrates. This rich concentrate is cold-steeped from a custom blend of medium-roast coffee, luring out dark chocolate and hazelnut notes for a smooth, satisfying taste. Starbucks Cold Brew Coffee Concentrate Dark Chocolate Hazelnut is perfect for those who love a cold iced coffee beverage. Just mix this rich concentrate with water and ice for a taste that’s smooth, delicious and perfectly yours. This multi-serve concentrate bottle makes 64 fluid ounces of cold brew coffee when prepared as directed and features fully recyclable packaging. Inspired by the cold brews served at Starbucks cafés, this easy to craft at-home option delivers the signature Starbucks flavor expected from every cup. Nestlé uses Starbucks trademarks under license.​ © 2025 Starbucks Coffee Company.

name: Starbucks Cold Brew Coffee Concentrate, Flavored Sweetened Vanilla & Chocolate Inspired by Irish Cream, Multi-Serve Bottle (32 fl oz)
short_description: COLD BREW COFFEE CONCENTRATE: Invite joy into your holiday with Starbucks Vanilla & Chocolate Flavored Cold Brew Concentrate—inspired by Irish Cream and easy to make at home, this multi-serve concentrate bottle is super-smooth and delicious
PERFECTLY DELICIOUS: Sweetened Starbucks Vanilla & Chocolate Flavored Cold Brew Concentrate is perfect for the holiday season with hints of vanilla and chocolate inspired by classic Irish Cream

IT'S EASY: Starbucks cold-steeped a custom blend of coffee into this deliciously sweetened concentrate, so all you have to do is pour concentrate over ice and add water to craft your very own Starbucks iced coffee beverage

PERFECT FOR HOLIDAY RECIPES: With Starbucks seasonal coffees like Starbucks Vanilla & Chocolate Flavored Cold Brew Concentrates, you'll be able to make recipes that celebrate the season and bring joy to your taste buds
THE PERFECT PAIR: Starbucks Vanilla & Chocolate Flavored Cold Brew Concentrate pairs perfectly with Starbucks Irish Cream Creamer or your favorite Starbucks creamer
product_description: Invite joy into your holiday with this limited-edition seasonal cold brew concentrate inspired by Irish Cream and bring cheer to your glass. Starbucks Vanilla & Chocolate Flavored Cold Brew Concentrate has notes of vanilla and chocolate that help make the season merry and your glass delightful. We’ve cold-steeped this custom blend of cold brew coffee with hints of classic Irish Cream flavors of vanilla and chocolate to make this deliciously sweetened concentrate. Add a touch of sweetness with a splash of Starbucks coffee creamer. This smooth and refreshing cold brew will fill your day with joy. Simply fill your favorite glass with ice, pour 6 fl oz of concentrate, then add 6 fl oz of water and enjoy. It also makes the perfect white elephant gift for adults. Hurry because this limited-edition favorite will be gone before you know it. Nestlé uses Starbucks trademarks under license. 2025 Starbucks Coffee. NET WT 32 FL OZ.

short_description: FLAVOR NOTES - Premium Arabica Perfection - Enjoy premium Arabica cold brew with a delicate touch of salted caramel sweetness in every smooth, refreshing sip.
ENJOY HOT OR COLD - Just peel, pour, and sip. Hot or iced, no equipment needed
COST EFFICIENT - Barista-quality coffee at home for just over $1 per pod—compared to $7+ for a typical café beverage.

SUSTAINABLE PODS – Made with recyclable PET plastic for great cold brew with less environmental impact.

name: Wandering Bear Straight Black Organic Cold Brew Coffee - Extra Strong, Bold, Smooth, Unsweetened, Shelf-Stable, Ready to Drink, 100% Organic Iced Cold Brewed Coffee Drink - 32 fl oz, 6 pack
short_description: SMOOTH, BOLD, & READY TO POUR COLD BREW - Enjoy the convenience of cold brew with this ultra-smooth, bold organic iced coffee in straight black flavor. Each sip delivers a rich, never-bitter taste and freshly cold brew coffee.

EXTRA-STRONG CAFFEINE KICK - Each 6oz serving of this organic cold brew coffee packs 150mg of caffeine, delivering the strength of two espresso shots. Whether you need a breakfast drinks morning boost or an afternoon pick-me-up, this bold coffee cold brew keeps you energized.

LONG-LASTING FRESHNESS - Enjoy fresh, smooth cold coffee drink for up to 7 days after opening, thanks to our airtight packaging. This cold brew carton is shelf-stable until opened, making it a convenient and hassle-free coffee carton to keep on hand.

HIGH QUALITY & ORGANIC INGREDIENTS - Crafted with organic Arabica coffee beans, filtered water, and organic natural flavor, this organic coffee drink has no sugar added, free from dairy and unnecessary ingredients or additives.

STRONG & SMOOTH ENERGY BOOST – Designed for coffee lovers who crave rich flavor without bitterness, this organic cold brew coffee provides a steady, no-crash energy boost. Enjoy it straight or customize your iced coffee for the perfect refreshing sip.
